name: Ti Neptune
description: Ti was anetrunnerwho along alongsideBrigittewas attempting to contactAlt Cunninghamfrom beyond theBlackwall. The Voodoo Boys made a deal withEvelyn Parkerto steal theRelicbiochip fromYorinobu Arasaka, which contained the digitized personality construct, also known asengram, ofJohnny Silverhand. They believed the only way Cunningham would come to them was if they used Johnny's engram as bait.
